Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController

Class GUIScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController.GUIScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateGameController, GameViewController, JoinGameController, MainSceneController, PrivateGoalController, ProtocolController, RulesController, ScoreBoardController, StartingCardController, WaitingForPlayersController
public abstract class GUIScene extends Object
Abstract representation for a GUI interface scene. Allows to report errors through a pop-up. Allows to display chat on interfaces that supports it-
